text:
="preserve">Franco Giraldi (11 July 1931 – 2 December 2020) was an Italian director and screenwriter. He was born in Comeno, Kingdom of Italy. He directed "Seven Guns for the MacGregors" (1966), "Sugar Colt" (1966) and "Up the MacGregors!" (1967).
Giraldi died on 2 December 2020 in Trieste, Italy from problems caused by COVID-19 at the age of 89.
